general.gigTitle: design and develop website with elementor pro wordpress website development

sellerCard.description:
As a dedicated tech enthusiast with a strong passion for IT, I am Sijan Regmi, a seasoned professional with six years of hands-on experience in WordPress development. Specializing in frontend development, app development, WordPress, PHP, and backend technologies, I bring a wealth of expertise to address your diverse web-related needs.

I excel in troubleshooting WordPress issues. With a keen eye for detail, I am committed to providing top-notch services, ensuring that your website operates seamlessly.

description.content:
Website Development and Design with Elementor | WORDPRESS ELEMENTOR WEBSITE


Hello there!

Are you in search of a website that not only looks great but also perfectly captures the essence of your brand? Look no further! I'm a WordPress expert specializing in creating custom, visually stunning website using Elementor. Let's create an online presence that stands out from the crowd!

Services:

  • Custom Wordpress design reflecting your brand identity.
  • Expertise in using Elementor for seamless design creation.
  • Responsive design for optimal user experience on all devices.
  • Visually striking aesthetics to capture attention.
  • Optimization for smooth and enjoyable browsing.
  • Integration of essential features and functionalities.
  • Ongoing support to address your needs and concerns.


Some example websites i can create for you:

  • Business
  • E-commerce 
  • Landing Pages
  • Booking/Listing
  • Real Estate
  • Affiliate 
  • Blog/Personal
  • Membership


Ready to Elevate Your Business?


Contact me now to discuss your project and let's create a remarkable site together!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I provide my own design ideas and inspiration?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! Your input and ideas are highly valued. Please feel free to share any design concepts, color schemes, or examples of websites that inspire you. Together, we can bring your vision to life.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly and responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! Ensuring a seamless experience across all devices is a priority. I will design your website to be fully responsive, adapting to different screen sizes and resolutions, to provide an optimal browsing experience for your visitors.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I make updates to the website content myself?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Certainly! One of the advantages of using Elementor is its user-friendly interface. You'll be able to easily manage and update your website's content without requiring any coding knowledge. I'll provide instructions and support to help you navigate the content

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate e-commerce functionality into my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! If you require e-commerce functionality, such as setting up a shopping cart, product listings, and secure payment gateways, I can incorporate that into your website design. Let's discuss your specific requirements and create a seamless online shopping experience for your customers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help with domain registration and hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: While I primarily focus on website design and development, I can offer guidance and recommendations for domain registration and hosting services. I can assist you in selecting a reliable hosting provider and guide you through the domain registration process if needed.

packageList.title: Starter
packageList.description: Starter WordPress Website Design Using Elementor: Customized, Responsive Sites Up to 3 Pages.

packageList.description: Advanced WordPress Website Creation with Elementor: Tailored, Multi-Page Designs Up to 7 Pages.

openGraph.title: design and develop website with elementor pro wordpress website development

reviews.comment: Sijan did an excellent job building our WordPress and Elementor Pro website.  I know have a site that I can be proud of as I talk to my clients! Thank you, Sijan!

Outstanding Experience!
Sijan did an excellent job creating my website! He was highly professional, patient, and incredibly helpful throughout the process. His attention to detail, clear communication, and responsiveness made everything seamless. He took the time to understand my requirements and delivered exactly what I envisioned. I highly recommend Sijan to anyone looking for a skilled, dedicated, and professional website developer. Thank you for your amazing work!

This is the classic case of someone who has ability but poor attitude. Not proactive, collaborative and holds a sense of superiority that is ultimately wholy unnecessary. Be mindful him/his team will ignore your queries and lock you out of your own website then threaten to cancel when you won't let him have it all his way. 

Waste of time from a so called professional. Pride cometh before the fall...

seller_response.comment:
I'm sorry to see that you're dissatisfied, but I need to clarify a few points. We initially agreed on a project scope that included designing web pages, which I completed as per our agreement. When additional features such as API integration were requested, I made it clear these were outside the original scope and would incur additional costs.

Unfortunately, communication became challenging, and your approach was quite demanding and dismissive of the terms we had set. I strive to maintain professionalism and clear communication in all my projects. However, this became difficult with the manner in which my efforts were met and the expectations that continued to change.

I am always open to constructive discussions and finding solutions that benefit both parties, but mutual respect and understanding are crucial.

reviews.comment: Sijan Regmi truly IMPRESSED me with his website development skills. His attention to detail and code expertise exceeded expectations, while his politeness and willingness to go the extra mile made collaborating with him a joy. Highly recommend!
Would gladly hire him again. He is great at what he does.
